name: Fasterapple
tagline: The BIND database for a DNS service in China Mainland to accelerate the speed of Apple App Store. Not being updated frequently since Apple set up an App Store mirror in China Mainland.
body:
说明
====
db文件夹中的配置文件为BIND9所使用。里面包含了所有FasterApple项目解析所使用的配置文件。欢迎参考、借鉴、使用。

使用条款、版权、许可证
===================
无条款、无版权、无许可证

版权没有、翻版不究。


Instruction
===========
All the BIND9 configuration files that the FasterApple project has used are in db directory.

ToS/Copyright/License
=====================
No ToS, No Copyright, No license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
